Zombie Graveyard

So... You decided to visit the Zombie Graveyard... Your brave, but very foolish... A very scratch from a zombiemon can turn your Pokemon into a zombie...




PIKAZOMBIE!!! RAIZOMBIE!!! FLAREZOMBIE!!! VAPZOMBIE!!! EEVZOMBIE!!! ZOMBIESAUR!!! ZOMBIEMANDER!!! SQUIRTZOMBIE!!!
